definition: (of siblings) having the same father but different mothers/half (brother or sister)

sentences.english: And Ma as they are on is the half-sister of the snow is a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 和馬他們受到作爲月乃的同父異母的姐姐雪乃的挑戰。

sentences.english: One of David's sons raped his step-sister.
sentences.chinese: 大衛的一個兒子姦污了他同父異母的妹妹。

sentences.english: I was one of six children, with three more half-sisters, and our family was considered small.
sentences.chinese: 我家有6個孩子，還有三個同父異母的姐妹。

sentences.english: I was one of six children, with three more half-sisters.
sentences.chinese: 我是六個孩子之一，還有三個同父異母的姐妹。

sentences.english: I have deserted also his little half-sister .
sentences.chinese: 我遺棄了他的同父異母的小妹妹。

sentences.english: Now, Leung Puiyuk, half-blooded sister of Leung Yeuklam, is looking for Leung Yeuklam's three sons and their descendants.
sentences.chinese: 現同父異母的姐姐梁佩玉尋他們兄弟三人及其後人。

sentences.english: Her brother-german went abroad when he was 14years old.
sentences.chinese: 她的同父異母兄弟14歲出國了。

sentences.english: Ahmed Wali Karzai, the president's half-brother, is the city's main power-broker.
sentences.chinese: 伊，總統的同父異母兄弟，坎大哈的主要權力經紀人。

sentences.english: My half-brother,the Earl of Moray,tried to stop the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我的同父異母兄弟，馬裏伯爵，試圖想阻止這場婚姻。

sentences.english: She and her baby, my half sister, slept in the front room.
sentences.chinese: 她和我那同父異母的小妹睡在前屋。

sentences.english: Also a half sister to Abraham on Terah his father's side.
sentences.chinese: 她也是亞伯拉罕同父異母的妹妹。

definition: to adopt/to give for adoption (usually to a childless relative)
two simultaneous happy events in the family
